title: Bride of the Water God, Volume 9
description: Deceived by a shape-shifter, brainwashed by his fellow gods, and a victim of the Emperor's schemes, Habaek is a cursed and deeply confused Water God! Still yearning for Soah, his human bride, Habaek reveals that his memories have been restored and that he's now ready to uncover the truth about his half-human, former bride, Nakbin - but Nakbin's ghost will not be laid to rest easily!
author: Mi-Kyung Yun
